Repeat: k3 wrapping yarn 3 times for each stitch; k7
sl 1 wyib, k3, sl 3 wyib dropping the extra loops, k3
sl 1 wyif, p3, sl 3 wyif, p3

sl 2 wyib, drop next (first Color B) stitch off the needle to the front of work, slip the same 2 stitches back to left hand needle, pick up dropped stitch and knit it; k3, drop next (third Color B) stitch off needle to front of work, k2, pick up dropped stitch and knit it; k3
[(p1, k1, p1) in next stitch, sl 2 wyif] twice, (p1, k1, p1) in next stitch, sl 3 wyif
End Row: [(p1, k1, p1) in next stitch, sl 2 wyif] 3 times, p1

Repeat: MB, (sl 2 wyib, MB) twice, sl 3 wyib
purl, purling into the back of each bobble stitch
